Changes:
  * fixed minor security issue - autogen password no longer
    printed in logs and requires root permissions to access.
  * code cleanup
  * added hook-debug config option to make hook more verbose
  * tidied up README

# Changes

* Add Apache2 support via engine config
* Add VCS bash charm helper for wp-content
* Fix defaults in configuration
* Fix secret key scale-out
* Add copyright headers to files

# Commits

  Marco Ceppi 2012-12-13 Fix for secrety key and cookies
  Marco Ceppi 2012-12-13 Make sure apache respects the canonical name for cookies and the like
  Marco Ceppi 2012-12-13 Preserve host
  Marco Ceppi 2012-12-13 Set the request header to make sure assets work properly
  Marco Ceppi 2012-12-13 [merge] proxy_http
  Marco Ceppi 2012-12-12 proxy_http needs to be enabled
  Marco Ceppi 2012-12-12 Include proxy_http
  Marco Ceppi 2012-12-12 Enable proxy_balancer
  Marco Ceppi 2012-12-12 Fix to balancermember lines and conditional for nginx only memcached configuration
  Marco Ceppi 2012-12-12 Fix to loadbalancer conf name for apache2
  Marco Ceppi 2012-12-11 Server lines need a ';' and when loading from cache need to strip() results
  Marco Ceppi 2012-12-11 Use the restart hook
  Marco Ceppi 2012-12-11 Backwards compat fix
  Marco Ceppi 2012-12-11 Enable multiverse for the apache2 stuff
  Marco Ceppi 2012-12-11 Make sure sed expands shell variable
  Marco Ceppi 2012-12-11 Don't need to listen on 80
  Marco Ceppi 2012-12-11 Final changes to make apache2 switches work properly in the charm
  Marco Ceppi 2012-12-11 Added default apache files
  Marco Ceppi 2012-12-11 Updates to fix linting issues, added Apache template
  Marco Ceppi 2012-12-11 Changes to website relation
  Marco Ceppi 2012-11-21 Updated files with copyright headers, adding in all apache stuff, new loadbalancer-rebuild sym, apache files, etc
  Marco Ceppi 2012-11-21 Now we use charm-helper
